channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (23 Oct 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-10-23/#comment-199">Coeus</a>.
Have you considered either of these?
News (has a two column area on the homepage you could use) http://my.studiopress.com/themes/news/
Magazine (you could probably get a developer to quickly adapt into two columns) http://my.studiopress.com/themes/magazine/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Coeus.

Have you considered either of these?

News (has a two column area on the homepage you could use)
http://my.studiopress.com/themes/news/

Magazine (you could probably get a developer to quickly adapt into two columns)
http://my.studiopress.com/themes/magazine/

item.title: By: Coeus
item.dc:creator: Coeus
item.description: I am looking for 1 themes genesis divided into 2 columns news. But I want it really simple and has little distinctive look. Please help me. Thank you
item.content:encoded: I am looking for 1 themes genesis divided into 2 columns news. But I want it really simple and has little distinctive look. Please help me. Thank you

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description: Thank you for including "Elise" in your guide this week. Thank you also for the compliment - I got a laugh out of "Genesis community legend" :)
item.content:encoded: Thank you for including “Elise” in your guide this week. Thank you also for the compliment – I got a laugh out of “Genesis community legend” ðŸ™‚
